#This is a working PIG project that is used for development and testing

= Introduction =

I include this folder while developing PUG/PIG as a set of examples and references. They are not necessarily well organized or thought out, but they represent the basic project layout for PIG.


= Details =

To try the editor with Example_Project, run edit_project.py in the root Example_Project folder.
To run the project standalone, run main.py in the root Example_Project folder.
